thread.title: Comment on Oscar Combs is Predicting Championship Number Nine by Backwoods Loser
thread.title_full: Comment on Oscar Combs is Predicting Championship Number Nine by Backwoods Loser

author: Backwoods Loser
title: Comment on Oscar Combs is Predicting Championship Number Nine by Backwoods Loser
text:
Posted in Basketball , Main | 3 Responses 
A man who is hesitant to EVER make a bold prediction, isn’t hesitiating this year. Oscar Combs believes the 2016 Cats are winning the National Championship. 
On Tent City Live, Oscar told Matt that this year is Kentucky’s year. They have all the right pieces to make up a championship team – a vengeful Alex Poythress and arguably the best point guard in the country. 
“Cal’s in overdrive now,” Oscar said. “Tyler Ulis is gonna be as good as anybody in the country. I’m not gonna say he’s the best, but I’m gonna say I haven’t seen anybody better.” 
Oscar said Kentucky will still probably lose five or six games, but at the end of March, the BBN will be smiling. 
If you aren’t WATCHING or LISTENING then you’re missing out, because they’re just getting started. (Word on the street is the Coach Cal will come by around 9:00.) Article written by Nick Roush "Look upon the doughnut, and not upon the hole." @RoushKSR 3 responses to “Oscar Combs is Predicting Championship Number Nine” October 1, 2015 at 8:47 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Hope you are right Oscar The Amazing Kreskin October 1, 2015 at 9:01 pm | Permalink | Reply
